root.title: LiveKD Kernel Memory Dump File Created
root.description: Detects the creation of a file that has the same name as the default LiveKD kernel memory dump.
root.author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)

falsepositives.item: In rare occasions administrators might leverage LiveKD to perform live kernel debugging. This should not be allowed on production systems. Investigate and apply additional filters where necessary.
